overview: Fred joins Vivonet as Vice President of Product, where he will focus on product roadmap and delivery for Haloâ„¢, Vivonetâ€™s SaaS product. With over 17 years experience in the software industry, Fred has successfully managed and led product teams at both Fortune 500 and start-up companies. He has a proven track record of defining, building and delivering customer driven products. His passion for software started at the young age of 10, when he designed and wrote his fist software program â€“ a video game for the TRS-80. Since then, Fred has continued to foster his interest in software development and design, and he has worked alongside some of the most experienced technology professionals in the industry. Fred has spent 11 years at Business Objects (formerly Crystal Decisions) where he was VP of Enterprise Reporting, overseeing three releases of Crystal Reports which generated over $80 million in annual revenue. Prior to joining Vivonet, Fred was the co-founder and CTO at Indicee, a SaaS business intelligence company which won the 2010 BCTIA Most Promising Startup Award.
